name: enchanted lands - Cryptic Island Eco Sanctuary
name_original: enchanted lands - Cryptic Island Eco Sanctuary
description:
an ambient exploratory experience accompanying enchanted lands' "Cryptic Island Eco-Sanctuary" album, released on Quantum Natives on the 27th July 2020.

Made by enchanted lands and Wim Dehaen.

The album can be downloaded here, and streamed here

"a trail carved into the mesh valley; crisscrossing between moss domains; simulated foliage, a makeshift observation deck; sound pebbles sliding thru monumental formations.. crumbling, blowing away like a baltic sand apparition in a greenhouse snowglobe world.

digital timbres bloom, a voice self-harmonizes in an impossible room resonance, harp plucks soften into whispers. an intricate chime apparatus is perpetually at play with a gust of wind, moving sound is summoned and tunnels through a canyon, reflecting, scattering, diffusing on its way but also growing, merging, splitting, transforming. sounds blend and precipitate, at times taking on a quality that is material, textural; razor sharp laser etched metal, complex semi transparent ceramics, even translucent, breathing skin."
